txt.en: 'Well, well, well...lookie who's come to play the game...whoop-de-doo...drink the six, quick, quick, quick...don't make me tell you what you know...drink....'
'Someone should give you a...good cheer. You are...amazing!'\n\n'Hurry and go finish. The Bird and...Baby is in Michel Delving. Don't drink and...ride....'
'Hurry to The Ivy Bush in Hobbiton and speak with the Inn League member there. Hurry! Time is a-wasting.'
The Ivy Bush is on the Bywater Road in Hobbiton town centre.\n\nHead to The Ivy Bush Inn in Hobbiton and talk to the Inn League member there.
Drink six beers within the allotted amount of time.
'Oh are you having problems, silly one? Can't handle your..beer?'
Drink five more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink four more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink three more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink two more beers within the allotted amount of time.
Drink one more beer within the allotted amount of time.
Full and queasy with drink, you should now speak with the Inn League member in front of you.
Talk to the Inn League Member in The Ivy Bush Inn

As a member of the Inn League you are allowed to periodically test your mettle by once more completing the initiation trial.\n\n<rgb=#FF0000> NOTE: This quest will be removed from your quest log when the current festival ends. </rgb>
You have begun stage six of the Inn League's initiation.\n
